text: Thomas P. Tiffany (born December 30, 1957) is an American businessman and politician. He was the U.S. Representative for Wisconsin's 7th congressional district since 2020. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from Wisconsin
title: Tom Tiffany
